summary: This document is an email correspondence involving Lisa D. Hurd and Amanda Kirby from Deutsche Bank regarding the status of certain financial positions related to a shell account. The communication indicates an internal inquiry about account management and updates.

persons.name: Lisa D Hurd
persons.context: Lisa D. Hurd is inquiring about the status of financial positions related to a shell account.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is following up with Lisa D. Hurd regarding the receipt of financial positions.

persons.name: Harry Beller
persons.context: Harry Beller forwarded information to Amanda Kirby regarding Southern Financial.

connections.description: Amanda Kirby is reaching out to Lisa D. Hurd for updates on account management.
Harry Beller forwarded information to Amanda Kirby regarding financial positions.

locations: 345 Park Avenue, New York, NY, USA
keyFacts: The document is an email correspondence dated October 21, 2013.
Lisa D. Hurd is inquiring about the status of two financial positions related to a shell account.
Amanda Kirby is an associate at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas.
Harry Beller forwarded information to Amanda Kirby regarding Southern Financial.
